<Text: East Fork State Park:  It has camping, hiking, swimming and boating opportunities.>

Text: East Fork State Park:  The state park is home to many junior and collegiate rowing races, including the US Rowing Youth National Championships.

Triplets:<East Fork State Park
3:

<Text: East Fork State Park:  The main lake in the park is William H. Harsha Lake.>
Triplets:<East Fork State Park

Text: East Fork State Park:  The large earthen dam, and smaller saddle dams, are operated by a crew of U.S. Army Corps of Engineers year round.
